about_the_game:
DOES NOT INCLUDE IN-GAME CONTENT OR THE GAME ITSELF!

A wave of memories washes over you. The bitter ones are like sand against your skin. The sweet ones like foam for you to float upon.

"These sounds, Operator."

"Haven't we heard them before?"

Even though only one song I wrote made it into the final game, this version includes 30 or so songs I wrote over the course of the game's development.

Only purchase if you have the money and you want to support what I do.

Cheers!

(Also the screenshots are from early versions of the game as I worked on it from 2022 to 2023. I can't seem to remove them so here they are.)

name: Keyboard Warrior: Dreamstate Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 630 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
